content: Insurance Asked by AnonymousAsked on 31 Mar 2019I am a turning 20 this year, i have a Integrated Shield Plan with Axa, should i be considering any other insurance plans right now or wait till i am older and working?1 answerAnswerBump1

God of WisdomAnswered on 31 Mar 2019If you don't have a steady income, you can't commit to an insurance plan.So once you get your first paycheck from a full time job, make sure you purchase your life insurance. :)0 comments0
